name: Shiatsu - Juliane Kröll
description:
Muru Aki - relaxing massages from Paradise. Call it a mini-vacation in the South Seas: Hot stones, cool coconut oil, tropical floral scent and shells form the perfect combination for the absolute harmonization of the organism. The Muru Aki-massage is highly recommended, especially during the cold season. The body is flooded with heat, the oil pampers the skin and your senses will be enchanted by a unique fragrance.

Please call for an appointment.
